Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Isravelin Koththirangalellaam Ebronilirukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Vandhu: Idho, Naangal Ummudaiya Elumbum Ummudaiya Maamsamumaanavargal.

2 savul Engalmel Raajaavaayirukkumpodhe Isravelai Nadaththikkonduponavarum Nadaththikkonduvandhavarum Neere; Karththar: En Janamaagiya Isravelai Nee Meyththu, Nee Isravelinmel Thalaivanaayiruppaai Endru Ummidaththil Sonnaare Endraargal.

3 isravelin Mooppar Ellaarum Ebronile Raajaavinidaththil Vandhaargal; Dhaaveedhuraajaa Ebronile Karththarukkumunbaaga Avargalode Udanpadikkaipanninapinbu, Avargal Dhaaveedhai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal.
4 dhaaveedhu Raajaavaagumpodhu, Muppadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan; Avan Naarpadhu Varusham Raajyabaarampanninaan.
5 avan Ebronile Yoodhaavinmel Ezhu Varushamum Aaru Maadhamum, Erusalemile Samastha Isravelinmelum Yoodhaavinmelum Muppaththumoondru Varushamum Raajyabaarampanninaan.

6 dhesaththile Kudiyirukkira Eboosiyarmel Yuththampanna Raajaavaanavan Than Manusharodekooda Erusalemukkup Ponaan. Avargal: Idhile Pravesikka Dhaaveedhinaal Koodaadhu Endru Enni, Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Nee Idharkul Pravesippadhillai; Kurudarum Sappaanigalum Unnaith Thaduppaargal Endru Sonnaargal.
7 aanaalum Dhaaveedhu Seeyon Kottaiyaip Pidiththaan; Adhu Dhaaveedhin Nagaramaayitru.

8 evan Saalagaththin Vazhiyaai Eri, Eboosiyaraiyum Dhaaveedhin Aaththumaa Pagaikkira Sappaanigalaiyum, Kurudaraiyum Muriya Adikkiraano, Avan Thalaivanaayiruppaan Endru Dhaaveedhu Andraiyadhinam Solliyirundhaan; Adhanaal Kurudanum Sappaaniyum Veettile Varalaagaadhu Endru Sollugiradhundu.
9 andhak Kottaiyile Dhaaveedhu Vaasampanni, Adharku Dhaaveedhin Nagaram Endru Perittu, Millo Ennum Sthalanthuvakki, Utpuramattum Sutrilum Irukkira Madhilaik Kattinaan.
10 dhaaveedhu Naalukkunaal Viruththiyadaindhaan; Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avanodekooda Irundhaar.
11 theeruvin Raajaavaagiya Eeraam Dhaaveedhinidaththil Sthaanaapadhigalaiyum Kedhurumarangalaiyum, Thachcharaiyum, Kalthachcharaiyum Anuppinaan; Avargal Dhaaveedhukku Oru Veettaik Kattinaargal.
12 karththar Thannai Isravelinmel Raajaavaagath Thidappaduththi, Thammudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelinimiththam Thannudaiya Raajyaththai Uyarththinaar Endru Dhaaveedhu Kandarindhapodhu,
13 avan Ebronilirundhu Vandhapinbu, Erusalemil Innum Adhigamaana Marumanaiyaattigalaiyum Sthreegalaiyum Kondaan; Innum Adhiga Kumaararum Kumaaraththigalum Dhaaveedhukkup Pirandhaargal.
14 erusalemil Avanukku Sammuvaa, Sobaap, Naaththaan, Saalomon,
15 ippaar, Elisoovaa, Neppek, Yappiyaa,
16 elishaamaa, Eliyaadhaa, Elippeledh Ennum Pergalaiyudaiya Kumaarar Pirandhaargal.

17 dhaaveedhai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal Endru Pelisthar Kelvippattapodhu, Avargal Ellaarum Dhaaveedhaith Thedumpadivandhaargal; Adhai Dhaaveedhu Kettapodhu, Oru Aranippaana Idaththukkupponaan.
18 pelistharo Vandhu, Reppaayeem Pallaththaakkile Paraviyirundhaargal.

19 pelistharukku Virodhamaaippogalaamaa, Avargalai En Kaiyil Oppukkoduppeeraa Endru Dhaaveedhu Karththaridaththil Visaariththapodhu, Karththar: Po, Pelistharai Un Kaiyil Nichchayamaai Oppukkoduppen Endru Dhaaveedhukku Sonnaar.

20 dhaaveedhu Paagaal Praaseemukku Vandhu, Ange Avargalai Muriya Adiththu, Thanneergal Udaiththodugiradhupola, Karththar En Saththurukkalai Enakku Munbaaga Udaiththu Odappanninaar Endru Solli, Adhinimiththam Andha Sthalaththirkup Paagaalpiraaseem Endru Perittaan.
21 ange Pelisthar Thangal Vikkiragangalaivittu Odipponaargal; Avaigalai Dhaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Sutteriththaargal.
22 pelisthar Thirumbavum Vandhu, Reppaayeem Pallaththaakkile Iranginaargal.
23 dhaaveedhu Karththaridaththil Visaariththadharku, Avar: Nee Neraaip Pogaamal, Avargalukkup Pinnaale Sutri, Musukkattai Sedigalukku Edhireyirundhu, Avargalmel Paaindhu,

24 musukkattai Sedigalin Nunigalile Sellugira Raichchalai Nee Ketkumpodhu, Seekkiramaai Ezhumbippo; Appozhudhu Pelistharin Paalayaththai Muriya Adikka, Karththar Unakku Munbaagap Purappattiruppaar Endraar.
25 karththar Dhaaveedhukkuk Kattalaiyittapragaaram Avan Seydhu, Pelistharaik Kebaa Thuvakkik Keser Ellaimattum Muriya Adiththaan.
